data.actual_result: The audio gets muffled like it is when you're in a call
data.expected_result: The audio should be muffled like it is when you're in a call
data.short_description: When I leave a call and go to the homescreen then open up any app and watch a video the audio is muffled just like it is when im in a call
data.steps_to_repro: - Leave a call on discord - Press the home button and go to your hom screen - Open any video hosting app/website and watch a video
